---
title: "Immune-Related Adverse Events (irAEs)"
---

## What are irAEs?
Adverse events caused by immune activation
(e.g., checkpoint inhibitors).

## Common irAEs
- Colitis
- Pneumonitis
- Hepatitis
- Endocrinopathies

## CRA Oversight
- Long follow-up periods
- Delayed onset
- Steroid treatment documentation
- Re-challenge decisions
